dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE ng_poles_towers ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS voltage_level VARCHAR ; UPDATE ng_poles_towers SET voltage_level = 'S' ;

virtualTable.name: ng_poles_towers_extended
virtualTable.sql: SELECT wkb_geometry, icon_size, pylon_icon FROM ng_poles_towers, ng_line_styling WHERE ng_poles_towers.voltage_level = ng_line_styling.voltage_level

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE ng_underground_cables ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS voltage INT , ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS voltage_level VARCHAR ; UPDATE ng_underground_cables SET voltage = CAST("OPERATING_" AS INT) ; UPDATE ng_underground_cables SET voltage_level = (CASE WHEN voltage >= 230 THEN 'S' WHEN voltage < 230 and voltage >= 35 THEN 'H' WHEN voltage < 35 and voltage >= 1 THEN 'M' end) ;

virtualTable.name: ng_underground_cables_extended
virtualTable.sql: SELECT wkb_geometry, line_colour, line_width, outline_colour, outline_width FROM ng_underground_cables, ng_line_styling WHERE ng_underground_cables.voltage_level = ng_line_styling.voltage_level
